byline.original: By PAM BELLUCK and MELENA RYZIK

abstract: Tribeca Film Festival plans to screen film Vaxxed: From Cover-Up to Catastrophe, directed and co-written by Andrew Wakefield, doctor who was stripped of his medical license over debunked research linking vaccines to autism; Robert De Niro, one of festival's founders, seems to suggest in statement that film was included in festival lineup at his insistence.
lead_paragraph: The decision to screen the movie, which was directed by a former doctor whose medical license was revoked, has reignited a debate about autism and vaccines.

headline.main: Robert De Niro Defends Screening of Anti-Vaccine Film at Tribeca Festival
headline.print_headline: Tribeca Film Festival to Screen an Anti-Vaccination Movie

snippet: The decision to screen the movie, which was directed by a former doctor whose medical license was revoked, has reignited a debate about autism and vaccines.
